channel.title: Bubbler - Text Based RPG
channel.description:
[img]http://bubbler.site88.net/img/title.png[/img] [b]Welcome to Bubbler's Game Development Thread,[/b] Bubbler is an online text-based RPG game that will eventually be made into a 2D java game [once it gets people and I start learning more Java and I get a development team.] Some updates will be posted here, and others will be posted on the website. For media please visit the [url=http://www.bubbler.site88.net]website.[/url] [size=8pt]no links work on the website [b]for now[/b], it's just for show[/size] Current Update Log [b]*Finished[/b] [b]*Started[/b]
[b]June 20: Register an Account [/b] [color=#f17700][b]June 20: Started Basic Admin Edit Content[/b] [b]June 20: Started MySQL Newsfeed handler[/b] [b]June 20: Added Important and Regular News on News Feed June 20: Made News Feed On Homepage June 20: Made Player Rights June 20: Made Homepage June 20: Made Logo[/b]

item.title: Bubbler - Text Based RPG
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

How long until your going to start adding content, Is it going to be Online/Multiplayer? If so how long do you think it will take you to release a beta?

item.title: Bubbler - Text Based RPG
item.dc:creator: @Bubbler Bubbler
item.description:
@Bubbler wrote:

To sum it up, its.basically a text based version of runescape so you can play it on a mobile device

item.title: Bubbler - Text Based RPG
item.dc:creator: @Bubbler Bubbler
item.description:
@Bubbler wrote:

Welcome to Bubbler’s Game Development Thread,
Bubbler is an online text-based RPG game that will eventually be made into a 2D java game [once it gets people and I start learning more Java and I get a development team.] Some updates will be posted here, and others will be posted on the website. For media please visit the website.
[size=8pt]no links work on the website for now, it’s just for show[/size]

Current Update Log
*Finished
*Started

[b]June 20: Register an Account [/b] [color=#f17700][b]June 20: Started Basic Admin Edit Content[/b] [b]June 20: Started MySQL Newsfeed handler[/b] [b]June 20: Added Important and Regular News on News Feed June 20: Made News Feed On Homepage June 20: Made Player Rights June 20: Made Homepage June 20: Made Logo[/b]

Read full topic
